name: Extreme Bus Driving
description:
Enjoy the ride of bus simulator 2018 and make this ride memorable! Become the expert crazy bus driver by driving urban transporter bus. In Extreme Bus Driving take people from one bus terminal to another, show them amazing places and city during driving. Do not exceed the speed limit of public transporter bus and drive safely to reach your destination because you are the main stakeholder for saving the lives of all the passengers of real transporter bus, so drive carefully on the off road and impossible track. By drive bus simulator you feel you played all type of games like urban bus transporter, public transporter bus, city bus transporter, euro bus simulator. Drive bus simulator with your skills and become crazy bus driver. By playing extreme bus driving game you feel this is the top bus driving game.

Features:
• Realistic bus controls.
• Stunning graphics and beautiful environment.
• Real city environment.
• Realistic traffic on roads.
• Cool sounds related with scenes.
• Multiple transport busses.
• Transport bus driver simulation is played offline.
